casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1158
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Gilberto Rodriguez TORRES, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 21, 1981.
Decided July 2, 1981.
John A. Goldstan, Reading, for appellant.

Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
